mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trainer (username, password, email, is_admin) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{is_admin})
mapper.update: UPDATE trainer SET last_used_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE trainer SET email_verified = true WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE trainer SET email_verified = false WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE trainer SET password = #{password} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE trainer SET email = #{email} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE trainer SET deactivation_date = NOW()+INTERVAL 3 DAY WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE trainer SET is_active = false WHERE deactivation_date < NOW()
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM trainer WHERE is_active = false AND deactivation_date IS NOT NULL AND last_used_date < NOW() - INTERVAL 2 YEAR
